traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
entries: If Shemeshka fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Shemeshka has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Special Equipment
entries: Shemeshka carries a magic crown called the Razorvine Tiara. In the hands of anyone other than Shemeshka, the Razorvine Tiara functions as a tentacle rod that deals slashing damage instead of bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Shemeshka uses Arcane Flux or Spellcasting. She then makes one Claw attack or one attack with her Razorvine Tiara.

actions.name: Arcane Flux
entries: Shemeshka causes a surge of arcane energy to burst around one creature she can see within 120 feet of herself. The target must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 45 (7d12 damage) force damage and has the {@condition incapacitated} condition until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d4 + 5 damage) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6 damage) poison damage.

actions.name: Razorvine Tiara
entries: Melee atk +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 10 (3d6 damage) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8 damage) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, or its speed is halved and it has disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the end of its next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Shemeshka casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}):
